text: Now it came to pass in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] when the judges [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8802" /] ruled [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8800" /], that there was a famine [strongs id="h7458" /] in the land [strongs id="h0776" /]. And a certain man [strongs id="h0376" /] of Bethlehemjudah [strongs id="h1035" /] [strongs id="h3063" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] to sojourn [strongs id="h1481" tvm="8800" /] in the country [strongs id="h7704" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /], he, and his wife [strongs id="h0802" /], and his two [strongs id="h8147" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /].

And the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the man [strongs id="h0376" /] [was] Elimelech [strongs id="h0458" /], and the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of his wife [strongs id="h0802" /] Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /], and the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of his two [strongs id="h8147" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /] Mahlon [strongs id="h4248" /] and Chilion [strongs id="h3630" /], Ephrathites [strongs id="h0673" /] of Bethlehemjudah [strongs id="h1035" /] [strongs id="h3063" /]. And they came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] into the country [strongs id="h7704" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /], and continued there.

And Elimelech [strongs id="h0458" /] Naomi’s [strongs id="h5281" /] husband [strongs id="h0376" /] died [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /]; and she was left [strongs id="h7604" tvm="8735" /], and her two [strongs id="h8147" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /].

And they took [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] them wives [strongs id="h0802" /] of the women [strongs id="h0802" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4125" /]; the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the one [strongs id="h0259" /] [was] Orpah [strongs id="h6204" /], and the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the other [strongs id="h8145" /] Ruth [strongs id="h7327" /]: and they dwelled [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] there about ten [strongs id="h6235" /] years [strongs id="h8141" /].

And Mahlon [strongs id="h4248" /] and Chilion [strongs id="h3630" /] died [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /] also both [strongs id="h8147" /] of them; and the woman [strongs id="h0802" /] was left [strongs id="h7604" tvm="8735" /] of her two [strongs id="h8147" /] sons [strongs id="h3206" /] and her husband [strongs id="h0376" /].

Then she arose [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8799" /] with her daughters in law [strongs id="h3618" /], that she might return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] from the country [strongs id="h7704" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /]: for she had heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] in the country [strongs id="h7704" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /] how that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] had visited [strongs id="h6485" tvm="8804" /] his people [strongs id="h5971" /] in giving [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8800" /] them bread [strongs id="h3899" /].

Wherefore she went forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] out of the place [strongs id="h4725" /] where she was, and her two [strongs id="h8147" /] daughters in law [strongs id="h3618" /] with her; and they went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] on the way [strongs id="h1870" /] to return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8800" /] unto the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /].

And Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her two [strongs id="h8147" /] daughters in law [strongs id="h3618" /], Go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /], return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /] each [strongs id="h0802" /] to her mother’s [strongs id="h0517" /] house [strongs id="h1004" /]: the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] deal [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] kindly [strongs id="h2617" /] with you, as ye have dealt [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] with the dead [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8801" /], and with me.

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] grant [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] you that ye may find [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8798" /] rest [strongs id="h4496" /], each [strongs id="h0802" /] [of you] in the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of her husband [strongs id="h0376" /]. Then she kissed [strongs id="h5401" tvm="8799" /] them; and they lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] their voice [strongs id="h6963" /], and wept [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8799" /].
And they said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, Surely we will return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /] with thee unto thy people [strongs id="h5971" /].

And Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Turn again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /], my daughters [strongs id="h1323" /]: why will ye go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] with me? [are] there yet [any more] sons [strongs id="h1121" /] in my womb [strongs id="h4578" /], that they may be your husbands [strongs id="h0582" /]?

Turn again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /], my daughters [strongs id="h1323" /], go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /] [your way]; for I am too old [strongs id="h2204" tvm="8804" /] to have an husband [strongs id="h0376" /]. If I should say [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /], I have [strongs id="h3426" /] hope [strongs id="h8615" /], [if] I should have an husband [strongs id="h0376" /] also to night [strongs id="h3915" /], and should also bear [strongs id="h3205" tvm="8804" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /];

Would ye tarry [strongs id="h7663" tvm="8762" /] for them [strongs id="h3860" /] till they were grown [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8799" /]? would ye stay [strongs id="h5702" tvm="8735" /] for them [strongs id="h3860" /] from having husbands [strongs id="h0376" /]? nay, my daughters [strongs id="h1323" /]; for it grieveth [strongs id="h4843" tvm="8804" /] me much [strongs id="h3966" /] for your sakes that the hand [strongs id="h3027" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] is gone out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8804" /] against me.

And they lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] their voice [strongs id="h6963" /], and wept again [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8799" /]: and Orpah [strongs id="h6204" /] kissed [strongs id="h5401" tvm="8799" /] her mother in law [strongs id="h2545" /]; but Ruth [strongs id="h7327" /] clave [strongs id="h1692" tvm="8804" /] unto her.

And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Behold, thy sister in law [strongs id="h2994" /] is gone back [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] unto her people [strongs id="h5971" /], and unto her gods [strongs id="h0430" /]: return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8798" /] thou after [strongs id="h0310" /] thy sister in law [strongs id="h2994" /].

And Ruth [strongs id="h7327" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Intreat [strongs id="h6293" tvm="8799" /] me not to leave [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8800" /] thee, [or] to return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8800" /] from following after [strongs id="h0310" /] thee: for whither thou goest [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /], I will go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /]; and where thou lodgest [strongs id="h3885" tvm="8799" /], I will lodge [strongs id="h3885" tvm="8799" /]: thy people [strongs id="h5971" /] [shall be] my people [strongs id="h5971" /], and thy God [strongs id="h0430" /] my God [strongs id="h0430" /]:

Where thou diest [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /], will I die [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /], and there will I be buried [strongs id="h6912" tvm="8735" /]: the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] so to me, and more [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /] also, [if ought] but death [strongs id="h4194" /] part [strongs id="h6504" tvm="8686" /] thee and me.

When she saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /] that she was stedfastly minded [strongs id="h0553" tvm="8693" /] to go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8800" /] with her, then she left [strongs id="h2308" tvm="8799" /] speaking [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8763" /] unto her.

So they two [strongs id="h8147" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] until they came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8800" /] to Bethlehem [strongs id="h1035" /]. And it came to pass, when they were come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8800" /] to Bethlehem [strongs id="h1035" /], that all the city [strongs id="h5892" /] was moved [strongs id="h1949" tvm="8735" /] about them, and they said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], [Is] this Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /]?

And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto them, Call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /] me not Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /], call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8798" /] me Mara [strongs id="h4755" /]: for the Almighty [strongs id="h7706" /] hath dealt very [strongs id="h3966" /] bitterly [strongs id="h4843" tvm="8689" /] with me.

I went out [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] full [strongs id="h4392" /], and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath brought me home again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8689" /] empty [strongs id="h7387" /]: why [then] call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /] ye me Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /], seeing the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath testified [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8804" /] against me, and the Almighty [strongs id="h7706" /] hath afflicted [strongs id="h7489" tvm="8689" /] me?

So Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /] returned [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /], and Ruth [strongs id="h7327" /] the Moabitess [strongs id="h4125" /], her daughter in law [strongs id="h3618" /], with her, which returned [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] out of the country [strongs id="h7704" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /]: and they came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] to Bethlehem [strongs id="h1035" /] in the beginning [strongs id="h8462" /] of barley [strongs id="h8184" /] harvest [strongs id="h7105" /].

And Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /] had a kinsman [strongs id="h4129" tvm="8675" /] [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8794" /] of her husband’s [strongs id="h0376" /], a mighty [strongs id="h1368" /] man [strongs id="h0376" /] of wealth [strongs id="h2428" /], of the family [strongs id="h4940" /] of Elimelech [strongs id="h0458" /]; and his name [strongs id="h8034" /] [was] Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /].

And Ruth [strongs id="h7327" /] the Moabitess [strongs id="h4125" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /], Let me now go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] to the field [strongs id="h7704" /], and glean [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8762" /] ears of corn [strongs id="h7641" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] [him] in whose sight [strongs id="h5869" /] I shall find [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8799" /] grace [strongs id="h2580" /]. And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, Go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /], my daughter [strongs id="h1323" /].

And she went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /], and came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /], and gleaned [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8762" /] in the field [strongs id="h7704" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] the reapers [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8802" /]: and her hap [strongs id="h4745" /] was to light [strongs id="h7136" tvm="8799" /] on a part [strongs id="h2513" /] of the field [strongs id="h7704" /] [belonging] unto Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /], who [was] of the kindred [strongs id="h4940" /] of Elimelech [strongs id="h0458" /].

And, behold, Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /] came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8802" /] from Bethlehem [strongs id="h1035" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto the reapers [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8802" /], The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [be] with you. And they answered [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] him, The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] bless [strongs id="h1288" tvm="8762" /] thee.

Then said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /] unto his servant [strongs id="h5288" /] that was set [strongs id="h5324" tvm="8737" /] over the reapers [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8802" /], Whose damsel [strongs id="h5291" /] [is] this?

And the servant [strongs id="h5288" /] that was set [strongs id="h5324" tvm="8737" /] over the reapers [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8802" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], It [is] the Moabitish [strongs id="h4125" /] damsel [strongs id="h5291" /] that came back [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] with Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /] out of the country [strongs id="h7704" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /]:

And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], I pray you, let me glean [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8762" /] and gather [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8804" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] the reapers [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8802" /] among the sheaves [strongs id="h6016" /]: so she came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /], and hath continued [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] even [strongs id="h0227" /] from the morning [strongs id="h1242" /] until now, that she tarried [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] a little [strongs id="h4592" /] in the house [strongs id="h1004" /].

Then said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /] unto Ruth [strongs id="h7327" /], Hearest [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] thou not, my daughter [strongs id="h1323" /]? Go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] not to glean [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8800" /] in another [strongs id="h0312" /] field [strongs id="h7704" /], neither go [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /] from hence, but abide [strongs id="h1692" tvm="8799" /] here fast by my maidens [strongs id="h5291" /]:

[Let] thine eyes [strongs id="h5869" /] [be] on the field [strongs id="h7704" /] that they do reap [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8799" /], and go [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] thou after [strongs id="h0310" /] them: have I not charged [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] the young men [strongs id="h5288" /] that they shall not touch [strongs id="h5060" tvm="8800" /] thee? and when thou art athirst [strongs id="h6770" tvm="8804" /], go [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] unto the vessels [strongs id="h3627" /], and drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8804" /] of [that] which the young men [strongs id="h5288" /] have drawn [strongs id="h7579" tvm="8799" /].

Then she fell [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8799" /] on her face [strongs id="h6440" /], and bowed [strongs id="h7812" tvm="8691" /] herself to the ground [strongs id="h0776" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Why have I found [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8804" /] grace [strongs id="h2580" /] in thine eyes [strongs id="h5869" /], that thou shouldest take knowledge [strongs id="h5234" tvm="8687" /] of me, seeing I [am] a stranger [strongs id="h5237" /]?

And Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, It hath fully [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8715" /] been shewed [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8717" /] me, all that thou hast done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] unto thy mother in law [strongs id="h2545" /] since [strongs id="h0310" /] the death [strongs id="h4194" /] of thine husband [strongs id="h0376" /]: and [how] thou hast left [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8799" /] thy father [strongs id="h0001" /] and thy mother [strongs id="h0517" /], and the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of thy nativity [strongs id="h4138" /], and art come [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] unto a people [strongs id="h5971" /] which thou knewest [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] not heretofore [strongs id="h8543" /] [strongs id="h8032" /].

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] recompense [strongs id="h7999" tvm="8762" /] thy work [strongs id="h6467" /], and a full [strongs id="h8003" /] reward [strongs id="h4909" /] be given thee of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] God [strongs id="h0430" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], under whose wings [strongs id="h3671" /] thou art come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] to trust [strongs id="h2620" tvm="8800" /].

Then she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], Let me find [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8799" /] favour [strongs id="h2580" /] in thy sight [strongs id="h5869" /], my lord [strongs id="h0113" /]; for that thou hast comforted [strongs id="h5162" tvm="8765" /] me, and for that thou hast spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] friendly [strongs id="h3820" /] unto thine handmaid [strongs id="h8198" /], though I be not like unto one [strongs id="h0259" /] of thine handmaidens [strongs id="h8198" /].

And Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, At mealtime [strongs id="h6256" /] [strongs id="h0400" /] come [strongs id="h5066" tvm="8798" /] thou hither [strongs id="h1988" /], and eat [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8804" /] of the bread [strongs id="h3899" /], and dip [strongs id="h2881" tvm="8804" /] thy morsel [strongs id="h6595" /] in the vinegar [strongs id="h2558" /]. And she sat [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] beside [strongs id="h6654" /] the reapers [strongs id="h7114" tvm="8802" /]: and he reached [strongs id="h6642" tvm="8799" /] her parched [strongs id="h7039" /] [corn], and she did eat [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /], and was sufficed [strongs id="h7646" tvm="8799" /], and left [strongs id="h3498" tvm="8686" /].

And when she was risen up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8799" /] to glean [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8763" /], Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /] commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8762" /] his young men [strongs id="h5288" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], Let her glean [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8762" /] even among the sheaves [strongs id="h6016" /], and reproach [strongs id="h3637" tvm="8686" /] her not:

And let fall [strongs id="h7997" tvm="8799" /] also [some] of the handfuls [strongs id="h6653" /] of purpose [strongs id="h7997" tvm="8800" /] for her, and leave [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8804" /] [them], that she may glean [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8765" /] [them], and rebuke [strongs id="h1605" tvm="8799" /] her not.

So she gleaned [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8762" /] in the field [strongs id="h7704" /] until even [strongs id="h6153" /], and beat out [strongs id="h2251" tvm="8799" /] that she had gleaned [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8765" /]: and it was about an ephah [strongs id="h0374" /] of barley [strongs id="h8184" /].

And she took [it] up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /], and went [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] into the city [strongs id="h5892" /]: and her mother in law [strongs id="h2545" /] saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /] what she had gleaned [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8765" /]: and she brought forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8686" /], and gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] to her that she had reserved [strongs id="h3498" tvm="8689" /] after she was sufficed [strongs id="h7648" /].

And her mother in law [strongs id="h2545" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, Where hast thou gleaned [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8765" /] to day [strongs id="h3117" /]? and where [strongs id="h0375" /] wroughtest [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] thou? blessed [strongs id="h1288" tvm="8803" /] be he that did take knowledge [strongs id="h5234" tvm="8688" /] of thee. And she shewed [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8686" /] her mother in law [strongs id="h2545" /] with whom she had wrought [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], The man’s [strongs id="h0376" /] name [strongs id="h8034" /] with whom I wrought [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] to day [strongs id="h3117" /] [is] Boaz [strongs id="h1162" /].

And Naomi [strongs id="h5281" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her daughter in law [strongs id="h3618" /], Blessed [strongs id="h1288" tvm="8803" /] [be] he of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], who hath not left off [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8804" /] his kindness [strongs id="h2617" /] to the living [strongs id="h2416" /] and to the dead [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8801" /].
